text: Akasamandala arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalobora allahara babe'i. Tomalokara manata yi ache seya prakasa karaa ba gopana karaa, allahe se'iborara hicaba tomalokara paraa laba. Tara pichata yaka iccha te'om taka ksama karaiba arau yaka iccha taka te'om sasti diba; arau allaha sakalo bastura oparata purna ksamatabana
